August 1st Meeting

"Why Are Short Sales So Hard?" Wednesday - August 1st - 7pm

Why are SHORT SALES so hard?  I mean, isn't there an easier way to do these deals?  These are common questions that many people are asking these days.  And the answer is, YES THERE IS!!  With short sales on the rise in MA, there are opportunities for both Realtors and Investors to make great money in this market!  Come hear local short sales expert Russ Bradchulis speak about the ins and outs of doing short sales the easy way and how to not lose your shirt --or your listing! -- when encountering short sales!

What will we cover?

How to get your offer to the top of the bank's list
Three simple ways to speed up your short sales
How to stucture offers that banks will take seriously
Two ways to do more short sale deals with less work

Speaker Bio:
Russ Bradchulis: Russ is the owner of Foresight Home Solutions, LLC.   He specializes in short sales and contract negotiations.  He is a licensed real estate broker who has plenty of experience working with banks, sellers, brokered real estate transactions, facilitated short sale deals and investors.  In addition, he is a mastery coach with Fortune Builders and has tutored many investors across the country.


To learn more about Russ, please visit: www.ForesightHomeSolutions.com
